room_title: Escape room "Escape the 80s" by Room Escape Atlanta in Atlanta
review: We had a great time!  It’s the first escape room experience I’ve had where the host was in full character from the time we arrived until we were done.  Although we weren’t able to actually escape the 80’s, Miracle was entertaining and did help us understand some of our clues.

room_title: Escape room "Escape the 80s" by Room Escape Atlanta in Atlanta
review: It was so much fun being able to find out clues as a team. I tried the 80s Escape room and i felt like i was in the 80s. This was such a fun experience , I will come back and recommend this to my friends. AMAZING! Alexa was an amazing party goer!

room_title: Escape room "Escape the 80s" by Room Escape Atlanta in Atlanta
review: Try escaping the 80s! Alexa made this experience pretty awesome!

room_title: Escape room "Escape the 80s" by Room Escape Atlanta in Atlanta
review: We did the Escape the 80’s Dance Party with Janise, we had a great time and the music was really good!

room_title: Escape room "Escape the 80s" by Room Escape Atlanta in Atlanta
review: The 80s-themed room was really fun! Thank you, Alexa, for pointing us in the correct direction. Super fun! Will be back when in Atlanta again.

room_title: Escape room "Escape the 80s" by Room Escape Atlanta in Atlanta
review: I escaped the 80s thanks to our host Miracle! So much fun!
